quote: How men fear the chaos of the world, I thought, and the yawning eternity hereafter. So we build patterns to explain its terrible mysteries and reassure ourselves we are safe in this world and beyond.
quote_letters: HOW MEN FEAR THE CHAOS OF THE WORLD I THOUGHT AND THE YAWNING ETERNITY HEREAFTER SO WE BUILD PATTERNS TO EXPLAIN ITS TERRIBLE MYSTERIES AND REASSURE OURSELVES WE ARE SAFE IN THIS WORLD AND BEYOND
